idea-plugin.name: Gruvbox Material Theme
idea-plugin.description: Gruvbox Material color scheme for editor and UI. Fork of https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/19469-gruvbox-material, which is based on the well known Gruvbox Theme https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/12310-gruvbox-theme, and existing Gruvbox Material theme https://github.com/sainnhe/gruvbox-material
